title: Department Office Timings
content: The Computer Science department office is open from 09:00 to 17:00 on working days. Lunch break is 13:00 to 14:00.

title: Head of Department
content: The Head of Department is Dr. Priya Nandan. The HOD office is in room C-102 and student consultation hours are 11:00 to 13:00.

title: Lab Availability
content: Programming Lab 1 (L-101) is available for practice from 16:00 to 18:00 on weekdays. Network Lab (L-203) is open only with faculty supervision.

title: Placement Cell Contact
content: For placement related queries, contact the placement coordinator at placement.cs@example.edu or visit room C-210.

title: Internship Support
content: Students can get internship recommendation letters from their faculty mentor. Requests should be submitted at least 5 working days in advance.

title: Project Review Process
content: Final year project reviews are conducted in three phases: proposal review, mid-term review, and final viva. Dates are announced by the department office.

title: Examination Cell
content: Exam form corrections, hall ticket support, and grade-sheet clarification requests can be submitted at the examination help desk in room C-115.

title: General Student Guidance
content: If information is unavailable with the assistant, students should contact the department office directly for official confirmation.
